query.name: tableNamesColumnNamesQuery
query.description: Querying metadata to get dynamically generated table names and column names
query.queryString: select temp2.Table_Name ,temp2.Class_Name,temp2.container_id, temp2.attribute_name,temp2.attribute_id, db.name column_name from DYEXTN_DATABASE_PROPERTIES db join (select temp1.Table_Name ,temp1.Class_Name, temp1.container_id container_id,cols.IDENTIFIER,temp1.attribute_name ,temp1.attribute_Id attribute_id from DYEXTN_COLUMN_PROPERTIES cols join (select m3.Table_Name ,m3.Class_Name,m2.identifier attribute_Id,m1.NAME attribute_name ,m4.identifier container_id from DYEXTN_ABSTRACT_METADATA m1 ,DYEXTN_ATTRIBUTE m2,dyextn_container m4, (select MT.identifier, PROP.name Table_Name, MT.name Class_Name from DYEXTN_DATABASE_PROPERTIES PROP, DYEXTN_TABLE_PROPERTIES tp, DYEXTN_ABSTRACT_METADATA MT where tp.ABSTRACT_ENTITY_ID = MT.IDENTIFIER and tp.IDENTIFIER = prop.IDENTIFIER and MT.identifier in (select identifier from dyextn_entity where ENTITY_GROUP_ID = (select identifier from DYEXTN_ENTITY_GROUP where long_name = '@entityGroupName@')) and MT.name like '@entityName@') m3 where m1.IDENTIFIER = m2.IDENTIFIER and m2.ENTIY_ID = m3.identifier and m4.abstract_entity_id=m3.identifier)temp1 on cols.PRIMITIVE_ATTRIBUTE_ID = temp1.attribute_Id ) temp2 on db.identifier = temp2.identifier
query.rowHeader: Table name,Class name,Container id,Attribute name,Attribute id,Column name
